title: Head of Operations (f/m/x)
body:
Head of Operations (f/m/x)

Our client is a leading provider of European short-term energy trading solutions and is looking for a Head of Operations to strengthen the team in Vienna and lead a team of experts of infrastructure and support areas. Reporting to the CTO you will be involved in shaping the strategy and providing hands on practice and technical expertise.

This is why you will love your job:

  • Leading strategic and operational management of the Operations team in Vienna
  • Overseeing complex network and infrastructure design along with further development of the SaaS strategy
  • Working closely with external clients regarding IT related questions and optimizing processes to increase efficiency
  • Organizing IT support according to ITIL
  • Working closely with other functions and contributing to the strategic management plan.
  • Leading, managing and coaching a growing team of 12. Giving them support and driving performance
  • Managing budgets and costs including personal planning, budgeting and controlling for the Operations function in Vienna
  • Overseeing the Information Security for Vienna in close collaboration with teams in London.


This is why we need you:

  • Experience managing people and teams, coaching and mentoring
  • Great interpersonal and communication skills
  • Great planning and project management skills
  • High level of knowledge in the area of IT infrastructure
  • High level of knowledge of :
    • LAMP stack
    • Software based IT Networks
    • Network design
    • ISO 27001
    • GDPR
    • ITIL
  • Fluent English and good knowledge of German
  • Experience in energy industry is a plus as well as knowledge of industry latest trends and best practices

What our client has to offer:

  • A unique environment with a large degree of creative freedom
  • Flexible working hours, home office
  • Free lunch & paid break
  • training budget
  • break room with table football, dart, etc.
  • Organic fruit, coffee & tea
  • Small & quiet offices
  • Fun events
  • Additional pension scheme
